name: Arctic Drilling Team Simulator
description:
Manage a team of researchers and engineers on an arctic drilling base! Can you survive long enough to drill all the way down to the anomaly and collect that core sample!  

(Yes, I did confuse the arctic with the antarctic, Yes, I do know there's nothing to drill through but water in the arctic, its too late to fix it so you'll just have to deal with it, lord knows I am)

Game is played entirely with the mouse, although there's some minor keyboard shortcuts (space = pause, 1/2/3/4 = speed, s = stockpile)

Its a little on the repetitive side, I ran out of time to add more events so you'll see the same few a lot, but I'm still happy with it regardless. As is always the hope I may come back and do a postjam version, but i also might not, who can say...

Rate it back on the LD website!
